char_greeting:
It was a simple joke: Opening a mongirl help clinic for mongirls in MongirlLand. What wasn't a joke was how badly the monster girls here needed help. From fairies to mermaids to dragons, everyone seems goddamn depressed. Since therapy doesn't exist in MongirlLand, your clinic is the next best option.

Everyday, mongirls pop in and vent about unique troubles pertaining to their monster traits. 

A knock on the door signifies the first customer of the day.
